A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am trying to just convince myself this movie never happened. They make Luke look like a weak unlikable grumpy old man. Poe an idiot who caused the fleet to be destroyed. The resistance to be another side of the same coin as the Empire\, aka \"everyone in war is bad\".  Jedis as not being good or bad or useful.  Chewie is sidelined. R2 and C3PO sidelined.   Finn is a coward until the end where he is about to make a heroic sacrifice but then the worst character since JarJar\, Rose\, saves him and makes a stupid speech about how love and not fighting will win the war. Even Leia is odd\, she litteraly gets sucked out into the void of space and uses the force to fly back to the ship. I can't even express my hatred for the new creatures made to please kids. Damn Porgs. Also the whole plot was completely pointless because the star destroyers could just jump in front of the resistance ship and blow It up. The whole going into hyperspace to ram the ships and blow them up makes all of star wars pointless because they could've just done that to the death star or any other threats. It seems like the director/writer were out to sabotage this series. I'm not even scratching the surface of what's wrong with this movie. They need to scratch this and remake it. It's the only way for them to save Star Wars. #RemakeVIII #Notmyluke #SithRianJohnson
